mapper.insert: insert into comments(comm_id, comm_content, comm_date, b_id, u_id) values (comment_seq.nextval, #{comm_content}, sysdate, #{b_id}, #{u_id})
insert into comments(comm_id, comm_content, comm_date, b_id, u_id, comm_del, parent_id) values (comment_seq.nextval, #{comm_content}, #{comm_date}, #{b_id}, #{u_id}, #{comm_del}, #{parent_id})
mapper.update: update comments set comm_content=#{comm_content} where comm_id=#{comm_id} and comm_del='N'
mapper.delete: update comments set comm_del='Y' where comm_id=#{comm_id} and comm_del='N'
mapper.select: select * from comments where comm_id=#{comm_id} and comm_del='N'
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE b_id = #{b_id} AND comm_del = 'N' ORDER BY CASE WHEN parent_id IS NULL THEN comm_id ELSE parent_id END, comm_date
